title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to reproduce the problem. Note: These tests may show false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. (This issue was observed in AJDT, where filenames that make no sense to AJDT are omitted.)
OB: In declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Sometimes, the filenames do not appear at all, although these tests do not reproduce that particular issue.
